name: Jon Limjap
text: Well, let's think about it. Could/ should a law have been passed? Isn't it too... draconian? Dictatorial? Unconstitutional? Wouldn't the fight have ended up in the Supreme Court still, just in a different flavor?

source_obj.text: Well, let's think about it. Could/ should a law have been passed? Isn't it too... draconian? Dictatorial? Unconstitutional? Wouldn't the fight have ended up in the Supreme Court still, just in a different flavor?
